result.arabic_text: وَمَنۡ خَفَّتۡ مَوَٰزِينُهُۥ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ خَسِرُوٓاْ أَنفُسَهُمۡ فِي جَهَنَّمَ خَٰلِدُونَ
result.translation: Nayo uwuzogira ivyiza biri ku rushi, maze umunzane w’ivyiza vyiwe ugahwahuka igihe c’iharurirwa, uyo rero azoba ari mu bahomvye ubuzima bwabo, bazoba mu muriro wa Jahannamu ibihe bidahera;
